meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jane Stimpson Glenn Edwards Justin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6206.

div.div:
Justin Sausville game 3.
First game of Season 28.
New title graphics.
First show closed captioning sponsor message aired at end of second break rather than before Final Jeopardy!
Alex limps onstage wearing a boot for his Achilles' tendon injury, and conducts contestant interviews from behind his own host's lectern.

td.p: Jane Stimpson, a reference librarian from League City, Texas
Glenn Edwards, an attorney from New York, New York
Justin Sausville, a urologist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 2-day cash winnings total $58,401)

tr.td: WHO'S BIBLICALLY SPEAKING?
NOBEL PRIZE CATEGORIES BY WINNER
AMERICANS IN PARIS
(Alex: In honor of our 28th season...)
28 IS GREAT
FROM "B" TO "Y"
FRIENDS WITH BENEFITS
